full_text:
Re: Jeffrey Epstein, 76318-054
From
To
Date 2019/07/28 23:46
Subject: Re: Jeffrey Epstein, 76318-054
Attachments: TEXT.htm, Mime.822

If you let Mr. know that I'll be there around 12:30, I'd appreciate it. Thank you!

From: @bop.gov
Sent: July 26, 2019 2:03 PM
To: @gmail.com
Subject: Re: Jeffrey Epstein, 76318-054

You can bring it to the lobby and as for Mr. our Assistant Health Services Administrator.

Yes, I will have the machine delivered on Monday. Please give me a name and a place for the delivery. Thanks again for your help.

From: @bop.gov
Sent: July 26, 2012011:46 AM
To: @gmail.com
Subject: Re: Jeffrey Epstein, 76318-054

Good morning Mr.

With apologies for the delay, medical staff can accept his CPAP machine. Would you or one of your associates be able to bring it in next week? It must be provided to medical staff rather than directly to your client.

Thank you,

Page 15911
DOJ-OGR-00024011

additional_notes: The document is an email chain discussing the delivery of a CPAP machine to Jeffrey Epstein. The emails are redacted, with names and email addresses obscured.
